whatIs.title: What is Anime OC Maker?
whatIs.description: Anime OC Maker is a specialized AI tool dedicated to creating vibrant original anime characters. It empowers users by providing a simple interface to generate unique characters complete with rich personalities and detailed backstories tailored to diverse anime styles. Let your imagination guide you while our AI takes care of the intricate design work, ensuring your characters stand out in the anime universe.

howToUse.subtitle: Effortlessly create, customize, and bring your anime characters to life.

steps.title: Step 1: Describe Your Character
steps.content: Start by outlining details about your character's appearance, personality traits, and background, such as 'a fiery red-haired warrior with a mysterious past.'

steps.title: Step 2: Customize Character Details
steps.content: Use our extensive options for hairstyles, outfits, accessories, and facial expressions, crafting your character to fit your unique vision.

steps.title: Step 3: Generate Your Character

faq.question: What is Anime OC Maker and how does it work?
faq.answer: Anime OC Maker is an innovative AI-powered tool enabling users to craft unique characters through detailed descriptions that the AI visually interprets.
